name: "Broken To Beautiful" Broken China Ornaments
description:
Proceeds from the sale of these beautiful, handcrafted, one of a kind ornaments are donated to women and children's shelters to help purchase school supplies for the captured angels who call them home. Given the right tools and a strong support system, victims of of domestic violence will see that it IS possible to go from broken to beautiful. Each angel ornament comes with a ribbon for hanging and is signed by the artist who handcrafted the piece. Several of these together would be so beautiful on a christmas tree! Angels measure approx 5" x 3.5".

*Please allow up to two weeks for delivery. Each angel is handcrafted as orders are received.

*Price includes shipping and handling.
